LanguageData.AdjustDirection_Desc: 按顺时针方向旋转。当前方向是: {0}
LanguageData.SALToggleForbidden_Desc: Allow/Disallow the auto-assembler to take forbidden items.
LanguageData.SALCancelBills_Desc: Click to make S.A.L. building drop its items and cancel bills.
LanguageData.SALAssignTimeTable_Desc: 打开时间设置表。左键单击单元格设定工作，右键单击单元来设置休眠。
LanguageData.SALInformation_CoreDriller_Desc: The settings seem to show that the fix for core drillers is currently turned off. When it is turned off, S.A.L. machines will not be able to interact with them. To turn it on, please go to Options -> Mod Settings.\n提示: 这条信息只会在游戏开始时出现。
LanguageData.SALSettings_CoreDrillerFix: 修复核心钻交互单元？Fix interaction cell for TheUbie's core drillers
LanguageData.SALSettings_CoreDrillerFix_Desc: (Compatibility patch) Fix the interaction cell for S.A.L. so that they can work in front of core drillers.
